overview: Candice Payne has it all, money, looks and fame. But this Hollywood heartthrob is no angel... Candice takes the world "diva" to a whole new level, armed with a furious temper, this prima donna is a royal bitch in overdrive. She yearns to be free of the contracts, critics and those needy, needy fans...well, she's in luck. The winner of a Candice Payne look-a-like contest, Susan happens to be in town and the devious Candice entices the young naive Susan to secretly take her place as Hollywood's reigning sex queen... Who would know? They look identical...but Susan's sexual appetite is way beyond the meager Candice's and it's an orgy of the senses as Susan becomes the ultimate wet dream queen and takes her part like she was born for it.
title: Mirror Image
